sourcesContent:
import { useContext, useState } from "react"; import BlockchainContext from "../store/BlockchainContext"; import { walletAddressSlicer } from '../utils/util' import InvestBox from "./InvestBox"; import InvestBabies from "./InvestBabies"; const MainSection = () => { const { handleConnectToWallet, account, handleDisconnectWallet, walletBalance, babiesStaked, babiesStakedByUser, mutantsStaked, mutantsStakedByUser, approveYourself, approveMutants, approveFrost, approveStatus, mutantsApproveStatus, frostApproveStatus, withdraw, withdrawMutants, babiesReward, mutantsReward, rewardPerday, constantReward } = useContext(BlockchainContext); const [activeStake, setActiveStake] = useState() return (

{babiesStaked / 100}% LilYetis Staked:

{mutantsStaked / 100}% MutantYetis Staked:

{babiesStaked} /10000

{mutantsStaked} / 3000
{ approveStatus === (false) ? (

Step 1: Approve the contract to Enable Staking your NFTs.

Step 2: Once complete, stake your LilYetis for free.

) : ( ) }
{ // TODO split investbox between bandits and mutants }
{ mutantsApproveStatus === false ? (

Step 1: Approve the contract to Enable Staking your NFTs.

Step 2: Approve the contract to Enable spending your $FROST.

Step 3: Once complete, stake your MutantYetis for a 100 $FROST fee.

) : ( frostApproveStatus === false ? (

Step 1: Approve the contract to Enable Staking your NFTs.

Step 2: Approve the contract to Enable spending your $FROST.

Step 3: Once complete, stake your MutantYetis for a 100 $FROST fee.

) : ( ) ) }

{mutantsStakedByUser.length} staked MutantYetis

Pending $FROST Reward {mutantsReward}

Chance of loosing token on unstaking : 5%

The money lost by LilYetis when claiming goes to mutants

Mutants also get LilYetis stolen when unclaiming

{babiesStakedByUser.length} staked LilYetis

Pending $FROST Reward: {babiesReward}

Chance of loosing token on unstaking : 5%

Chance of loosing staked FROST : 20%

Daily Reward: 20 $FROST / YETI

You are currently earning: {20 * babiesStaked} $FROST / Day

) } export default MainSection
